content:
Specify Negotiation (New)

  • A client must be able to specify how a negotiated resource performs its negotiation.

    • Example, if there are several language variants of a resource, how does a remote author inform a server that future content negotiated requests to resource A, requesting language L, will result in the retrieval of resource B (which is resource A in language L)?
